naslov: IVANICA BIH ROH BAU KUĆA OD DUBROVNIKA 7 km (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se stambena zgrada u izgradnji na Ivanici kod Dubrovnika. Planirana je gradnja pet stanova i jednog poslovnog prostora te ljetne kuhinje i bazena. Zgrada je trenutno u niskom roh bau stanju dovršenosti. Nekretnina se nalazi na lijepoj i mirnoj lokaciji s koje se pruža pogled na cijelo mjesto i more. Pogled se pruža na tri države, Hrvatsku, Crnu goru i BiH. Planirani raspored prostora: prizemlje: Posl.prostor   50,00m2 1. kat:    Apartman 1 -   60,89m2 1. kat:    Apartman 2 -   71,65m2 2. kat:    Apartman 3 -   60,89m2 2. kat:    Apartman 4 -   71,65m2 3. kat:    Apartman 5 -  172,00m2 Ukupno:                  487,08m2 Trebinje je udaljeno od Ivanice 20 km. Mostar je udaljen od Ivanice 110 km. Dubrovnik je udaljen od Ivanice 10 km. Herceg Novi je udaljen od Ivanice 50 km. Sve dodatne informacije u Agenciji DMP. ------------------- A residential building under construction in Ivanica near Dubrovnik is for sale. It is planned to build five apartments and one office space, as well as a summer kitchen and swimming pool. The building is currently in a low state of completion. (roh bau) The property is located in a beautiful and quiet location with a view of the entire village and the sea. The view extends over three countries, Croatia, Montenegro and Bosnia and Herzegovina. Planned space layout: ground floor: Office space 50.00m2 1st floor: Apartment 1 -    60.89m2 1st floor: Apartment 2 -    71.65m2 2nd floor: Apartment 3 -    60.89m2 2nd floor: Apartment 4 -    71.65m2 3rd floor: Apartment 5 -   172.00m2 Total:                     487.08m2 Trebinje is 20 km from Ivanica. Mostar is 110 km from Ivanica. Dubrovnik is 10 km from Ivanica. Herceg Novi is 50 km from Ivanica. All additional information in the DMP Agency.
